pages.text: One thing you'll need to rely on here is your &bInsight&r! Insight is what allows you to understand the world around you, and achieve things beyond the normal. You can gain insight by completing quests, achieving advancements, and by taking photos.

This item, known as the Ancient Eye, allows you to check your Insight. Once you reach a certain amount, you can leverage that Insight to purchase items from the &aInsight Shop&r. Be aware that if you spend too much, it may take you longer to accomplish your goals.
